ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: from Allah - the Lord of the Ascending Steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: From God, the Lord of the steps (of progression),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a chastisement from Allah, the Lord of the ascending steps,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No one can defend him against God, the Lord of the exalted positions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: From Allah, the Lord of all pinnacles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From Allah, the Lord of the ways of ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: From Allah, the Lord of the ways of Ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: from God, the Lord of the Stairways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From Allah, Lord of the Ascending Stairways
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: from punishing them. He is the Lord of the Ascending Stairways,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: From Allah, Owner of the ascending steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: from Allah, Lord of the lofty stations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (A Penalty) from Allah, Lord of the Ways of Ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From Allah, the Lord of the ways of ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (A punishment) from Allah, the Owner of the Elevated Passages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From God, Lord of the Ways of Ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:3] from God (mina’Llāhi is semantically connected to wāqi‘in, ‘impending’), Lord of the Ascensions, the   ascension routes of the angels, which are the heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (From Allah) this punishment of the disbelievers comes from Allah, (Lord of the Ascending Stairways) the Creator of the heavens
